sub_title: Director CS EUV UIR (Upgrades, Installation & Relocation) at ASML
summary:
Operations Executive with broad experience in (inter-)national Professional Services Delivery. Energetic leader with a result driven approach, strong analytical skills, innovative ideas and hands-on mentality. 

Key achievements @Ericsson: 
• Driver Diversity & Inclusion region western and central europe
• Assurance of leading positions for Swisscom, KPN and Mobistar in external performance benchmarks, ie P3 Connect and Commsquare.
• Supplier of the year 2013 awarded by KPN based on “always putting customer first” and consistent delivery performance.
• Successful commercial launch of KPN 4G network in February 2013 within less than 6 months lead time on top of an ongoing full 2G Network Modernization swapping out Nokia for Ericsson Multi Standard Radio equipment. Exceeding expectations with respect to time, quality and finance. 
• Transformation of a single customer network operations centre into an efficient global delivery centre, serving more than 10 wireless and wire line operator networks in Northern Europe, whilst providing reliable services 
• Increased margins in Managed Services and Customer Support business by 20%, through introduction of add-on sales, scope control, customer network focus and off shoring.

profile_positions.title: Director CS EUV UIR (Upgrades, Installation & Rel
Sr manager WW EUV Installation & Relocation

profile_positions.description: Responsible for embedment of the Future Mode of Operations within the Customer Support - New Product Introduction & Node Transition (CS NPI&NTR)
profile_positions.title: Sr manager Future Mode of Operations (FMO) - New Product Introduction & Node Transition

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for all pre-sales and end-to-end customer contract fulfilment of Network Roll-out, Design & Optmization, Managed Services and Customer Support related Services in the Netherlands. 

Main responsibilities: 
•	Single delivery interface to all customers (up to C-level) in the Netherlands, a.o. KPN,
        Vodafone, T-Mobile, Tele2, Ziggo and LGI, to secure End-to-End delivery focus, improved 
        customer intimacy and customer loyalty.
•	End-to-end accountable to turn Closing Backlog and Orders Booked into Net Sales
        and Margin by means of delivering contractually agreed services and products.
•	Day-to-day management and drive for operational excellence of presales and delivery teams
        (approx 400 FTE)
•       Budget accountable for all resources required for customer delivery, incl.Equipment, People,
        Tools and (3PP) Services.
•	Demand function for all type of product related services to enable the local, regional and
        global delivery organisations to scale up activities, share knowledge more effectively and drive
        synergies and efficiencies.
profile_positions.title: Head of Network Services NL + RWCE driver Diversity&Inclusion

profile_positions.description:
• Secure contractual delivery fulfilment for operators in the mobile, wireline and  cable industry in
  Switzerland, Germany, Netherlands, Belgium and Luxembourg. Main accounts; KPN Group, Telefonica, Swisscom, Salt., Mobistar, Proximus, Post and LGI (Ziggo) . 
• Secure quality of service and profitability according to approved business cases and drive Add-on-
  Sales opportunities.
• Main point of contact for C-level customer (ie delivery escalations) and managing
  expectations on Ericsson’s Operations, measured by Customer Contract Evaluations and 
  Customer Satisfaction Index (CSI) sub-measures for Delivery & Installation and Services.
• Providing Operations and CU organization with required inputs for competence development and 
  resource dimensioning.
profile_positions.title: Head of Operations CU Western Europe

profile_positions.description:
• Fulfillment responsible for all operational and financial contractual obligations towards KPN and third parties. 
• Secure quality of service and profitability according to approved business case and contract criteria.
• Main interface for service delivery towards the customer and responsible to establish and maintain effective governance processes with the Customer demand organisation. Including effective Relationship Management with the customer at all levels.
• Secure additional business into the customer and ensure that all opportunities are directed into the internal company accordingly
• Functionally managing program-/project managers and service delivery managers. Total team size approx. 250 excl. third parties.    
• Service domains in scope: Managed Services, Customer Support, System integration, Network Roll-out
profile_positions.title: Operations Director KPN

profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for service delivery performance and scope fulfilment for over  20 managed services wireless and wire line contracts in BeNeLux, Germany, Switzerland, Norway, Finland, Sweden and Baltics. KPI’s: network availability, incident lead times/handling & cost
• Creation of solution design and approval for top 20 Managed Services opportunities. KPI’s: utilization, efficiency, synergies 
• Global business consultancy and (pre-)sales support
profile_positions.title: Business Development - Business Consultant, Managed Services

profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for service delivery, performance, disaster recovery and business continuity of the Global Network Operations Center Rijen (24x7). 
• Insourcing Vodafone NL, Mobistar BE and Orange NL (total 200 FTE) into the Rijen operations, establishing a real multi customer service delivery unit.  
• 300 FTE: project managers, service delivery managers, solution architects, front and back office engineers
• >10 fixed/mobile operators in > 5 countries (incl. Vodafone, KPN, BASE, Telfort, Mobistar, Orange, O2, EMG)
profile_positions.title: Manager Global Network Operations Center

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for service delivery, 3rd party contract management, net sales & margin, strategic resource planning, soft- & hardware support, software maintenance and crisis management within Ericsson Benelux. 
• 103 FTE: service delivery managers, support- & integration engineers
• KPN, Vodafone, Telfort, T-Mobile, Base, BT, Inmarsat, etc.
profile_positions.title: Manager Customer Support & System Integration staff

profile_positions.description:
Responsible to create and maintain effective and efficient operations between Ericsson Enterprise and existing/new to implement sales channels in the Europe, Middle East and African region. 
Parts represented in organization: Operational readiness new sales channels, Customer support (soft- en hardware), Help desk and Logistics
profile_positions.title: Operations Director EMEA Enterprise channels
